pros: Foldable waistband can be hiked up over your tummy or rolled underneath
Comfortable enough to wear as loungewear
Can be worn pre- and post-partum
cons: Some complain that the fabric is a little thin

customer_reviews.title: Great price, decent product, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These pants are so soft! I love that they are straight leg and that they are so comfortable. The band around the belly could be a little softer, the seam is a little prominent for my taste. I would call these thin sweat pants rather than yoga because they do zero "shaping". Overall, very good purchase for the price! I'll probably add more to this review after a month. We'll see what a month of wear and washes does to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: hiwats

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the maternity description throw you
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants. I use them as pjs and they’re so comfortable. They’re listed with “maternity” in the title but don’t let that dissuade you. So very comfortable, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few different brands of black maternity yoga pants and this one is my favorite. Super soft, stretchy, as people have noted this isn't see-through thin, but it is thinner cool material (not the thick workout elastic pants of say, an Athleta pants), this is a light, easy to breath and move in pants. I will be purchasing another!
customer_reviews.author: John Yamada

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE PANTS!
customer_reviews.text: OMG....I wish I bought these earlier in my pregnancy. I love them! They are so comfortable. Not too tight like leggings and not too baggy. They fit me just right. I am going to be buying another pair or two to wear.
customer_reviews.author: april rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as heck
customer_reviews.text: I lived in these pants the last few weeks of my pregnancy, and still wear them! (Although there is much more room now) I would buy 10 pairs if I could! For reference I’m 5’7 and was 220 when pregnant and wore a large.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pants for my growing belly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pants for my growing belly. I am 5'2 so they are a bit long but I can always fold them over to make them a bit shorter. Very soft and cozy. I plan on taking them with me to the hospital when I deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and stretchy. Most importantly they are not see through.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tavarez

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my niece, who's 6 months pregnant ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my niece, who's 6 months pregnant. She loves the feel....and loves the way they look...as does her husband. 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Welby

customer_reviews.title: Very Sheer
customer_reviews.text: These were very thin and sheer. I returned them and wouldn’t recommend them unless you just wanted comfy PJ pants.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Wittum

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pants were comfortable but material was very thin and hot.
customer_reviews.author: EmbraceSerenity

product_meta.title: HDE Women's Maternity Yoga Pants Comfortable Lounge Pregnancy Pants Folded Waist (Black, Large)
